name: Scary House
description:
In Scary House you will play for a man who found himself in an unknown house, from which it is not easy to get out.
You have to solve complex riddles, find keys around the house to open doors.
But you also need to be on watch, because not everything is as safe as you might think.

In the game you will meet
- big house
- gloomy atmosphere
- awesome music
- challenging puzzles
and much more
